content: Where did you share it? I shared it on the Spondylitis Association forum. In the old system I have uSpA (“undifferentiated seronegative spondyloarthopathy”), so I get some psoriasis and pink-eye and reactive and enteric symptoms as well as the primary axial symptoms, so I just hit the HLA-B27 goldmine! (To look on the bright side, though, I seem to have traded the breadth of my symptoms for less degeneration and severity of most symptoms, for which I’m grateful.)
